description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet ecosystems. His work explores concepts like digital fragmentation, ecosystem architecture, and innovation practices. yeehaa's blog posts and courses cover topics ranging from internet culture and societal metaphors to breaking down organizational silos and valuing differences. He advocates for a diverse, user-driven web and applies regenerative design principles to address global challenges.
blurb: yeehaa, a PhD-holding ecosystem architect, merges philosophy with tech innovation. Based in Taipei, he's reshaping education and digital landscapes through startups and events. His work spans from internet culture to organizational design, advocating for inclusive, diverse digital ecosystems.
